Products that claim to support charity:
As you scroll through your Facebook or Instagram feed, you see an ad from a small business selling adorable jewelry, t-shirts, or other merchandise. If you keep your browser updated and have antivirus software on your computer, it should tell you when you’ve run across an unsafe site.

 If you click on it, a dropdown box will provide security information about the site including:
A padlock icon in the address bar generally signifies that the site has been verified as secure.
